message: Kinda curious how many people are attending their 3rd FGS.  Also, as a method of comparing...  how many people attended the 1st and 2nd events?
I sponsored the first FGS, good times were had by all

i wanted to catch the tail end of the first one.  Hopped off the plane from Toronto, ditched my luggage at the hotel, and jumped immediately into a cab heading for ... some random restaurant name. Don't know how i got it in my head.  But the $20 (!) cab ride took me to this dodgy barrio, and i walked around for an hour asking people where this restaurant was.  Turns out, the place had shut down a year ago.  Despondent, i took another $20 (!) cab ride back to the hotel and re-checked my notes.  The first FGS was about a block away from my hotel.

(i hate sites like FB that automatically post when you hit the ENTER key)  Anyway, i wound up following a group of people out who headed to a diner for some late-night breakfast, and they told me all about what i'd missed.  So is this my third FGS?  Very nearly ;)
I've been to all of them.  =)
I stood outside the first one but also missed it :) been to all others.
I've been to all three. Definitely more and more folks showing up since the first one!
The real question is whether or not you guys have the complete sticker collection for all of them ;)
Is there an official hashtag for FGS this year? Just #FGS?
@ada last year's mochi monster shirts were awesome. more of that!
